text: UMM, can you give me a screenshot of one of these modules?
like a screenshot of the code for
I think you are including custom modules and the export to template context isn't necessary for these because of their nature
those are generally for like a text box on a blog
to get your module embed, you would go to the bottom right of your custom module and it includes a hubl snippet you can copy to embed these modules in a custom html template

I'd also consider making your template with the header/footer included, and then using a flex column for your main section. This will allow you to put whatever modules you want on a page and prevent the need for multiple templates when they aren't needed
